client_description_Summary_Note:
The RM first encountered Daniela Consuelo Ramos on a skiing trip in the Swiss Alps. They spent the weekend skiing and discussing various investment strategies, which laid the foundation for a strong professional relationship.
Daniela Consuelo Ramos is a 26 year old Investment Banker from Spain.
She was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
client_description_Family_Background: Daniela Consuelo Ramos is married to Ruiz. They do not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
In 2018, Daniela finished her secondary school education at IES Salvador Espriu Barcelona.
Daniela completed her university studies at Universidad Pontificia Comillas in 2022.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Daniela Consuelo Ramos is a 26 year old and comes from Spain.
At CaixaBank S.A., Daniela Consuelo Ramos held the position of Investment Banker from 2023 to 2025, developing essential skills in the field.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 10000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
Client does not have any properties.
In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 2440000 EUR from her late grandmother, a renowned Private Equity Manager, in 2017.
client_description_Client_Summary: In summary, Daniela has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
